io.bretty.console.view

Class ActionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.bretty.console.view.AbstractView
      • io.bretty.console.view.ActionView

  • public abstract class ActionView
extends AbstractView
    Workflow of the default implementation: 1) print title; 2) execute custom action; 3) pause 4) go back to parent view

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_PAUSE_MESSAGE
      the default message to display when paused
      private java.lang.String pauseMessage
      the message to display when paused

      • Fields inherited from class io.bretty.console.view.AbstractView

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      display this view in the console
      abstract void executeCustomAction()
      to create your custom ActionView subclass, implement this method to execute your custom logic between printing the title and go back to the parent view
      protected void pause()
      print the default pause message, and the user may press enter to continue.

      • Methods inherited from class io.bretty.console.view.AbstractView
